availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Moses Preston Sr., and Elizabeth Haney Preston. Married to Emily Elizabeth Hager Preston in Johnson County on January 28, 1857. Father of Cyrus M. Preston and Daniel L. Preston, Mary C. Preston, James H. Preston, and Virtrese Preston. Resident of Johnson County in 1850. Merchant in Johnson County in 1860. Merchant in Johnson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 81A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Johnson County Marriages, 1843-1875, Film #001912950, p.178 of 239 of microfilm.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 9th Congressional District, Johnson County, Vol. 2 of 3, October 1863, p. 294.
